about-us.title: WE DESIGN, BUILD AND IMPLEMENT EFFECTIVE TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS

services.it-description: We create bespoke software, implement information technology precisely suited to the real needs of our Customers. We care about the quality of the developed systems.
services.solution-description: We deliver proper IT solutions. Explore some of the project examples executed by us. Each has provided unique, added value towards business development of our Partner.
services.recruitment-description: Our recruiters support partners in DACH Region ( Germany, Austria, Switzerland ). Our recruitment processes are customized, unique and professional. As a result we give a successful matching between Client requirements and Candidates’ skills.

jobs.title: HOW TO APPLY?
jobs.description: It’s easy. Just fill in the short form and our HR Department will contact you.
jobs.delivery-models-description: We offer Onsite, Nearshore and Offshore delivery models depending on the nature of the project and Client’s preferences.
jobs.onsite-description: All the design/development activities are performed by our consultants at the Client's site.
jobs.nearshore-description: All activities are performed by our staff in our delivery center in Poland.
jobs.offshore-description: All activities are performed by our staff in our center, which is located in Poland
